pages.text: Improves upon the $(l:justdirethings:tool_ferricore_hoe)Ferricore Hoe$(/l) with quicker action and 'Lava Repair'. Tilling creates Blazebloom soil, which boosts crop growth even more, and enables auto-harvesting - causing plants to drop their resources automatically.$(br2)Harvested items quickly despawn. Use the $(l:justdirethings:mach_itemcollector)Item Collector$(/l) to gather drops efficiently.
